conduits.name: Tough as Bark
conduits.description: Barkskin's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>10% - 24%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Ursine Vigor
conduits.description: For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by <dynamic>12.0% - 28.8%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Innate Resolve
conduits.description: Regrowth and Frenzied Regeneration healing is increased by <dynamic>12.0% - 28.8%</dynamic> on yourself.

conduits.name: Tireless Pursuit
conduits.description: For <dynamic>2.0 sec - 4.8 sec</dynamic> after leaving Cat Form or Travel Form, you retain up to 40% movement speed.

conduits.name: Unstoppable Growth
conduits.description: Wild Growth's healing falls off <dynamic>30% - 72%</dynamic> less over time.

conduits.name: Ready for Anything
conduits.description: Nature's Swiftness's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>10% - 24%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Unchecked Aggression
conduits.description: You gain <dynamic>10.0% - 24%</dynamic> haste during Berserk in Bear Form.

conduits.name: Well-Honed Instincts
conduits.description: When you fall below 25% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every <dynamic>90 sec - 37.5 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Layered Mane
conduits.description: Ironfur has an <dynamic>8.0% - 19.2%</dynamic> chance to apply two stacks.

conduits.name: Savage Combatant
conduits.description: Mangle increases the damage of your next Maul by <dynamic>10.0% - 24%</dynamic>, stacking up to 3.

conduits.name: Flash of Clarity
conduits.description: Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional <dynamic>20.0% - 48%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Floral Recycling
conduits.description: Swiftmend's healing is increased by <dynamic>30% - 72%</dynamic> of the consumed heal over time effect.

conduits.name: Taste for Blood
conduits.description: Ferocious Bite deals <dynamic>3.0% - 7.2%</dynamic> increased damage for each of your Bleeds on the target.

conduits.name: Incessant Hunter
conduits.description: Rip damage has a <dynamic>10.0% - 24%</dynamic> chance to grant 3 Energy.

conduits.name: Sudden Ambush
conduits.description: Finishing moves have a <dynamic>3.0% - 7.2%</dynamic> chance per combo point spent to make your next Rake or Shred deal damage as though you were stealthed.

conduits.name: Carnivorous Instinct
conduits.description: Tiger's Fury's damage bonus is increased by <dynamic>3.0% - 7.2%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Precise Alignment
conduits.description: The duration of Celestial Alignment is increased by <dynamic>4.0 sec - 9.6 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Fury of the Skies
conduits.description: Moonfire increases your Arcane damage to the target, and Sunfire increases your Nature damage to the target, by <dynamic>3.0% - 7.2%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Umbral Intensity
conduits.description: Eclipse's damage bonus to Wrath and Starfire starts <dynamic>20.0% - 48%</dynamic> stronger.

conduits.name: Stellar Inspiration
conduits.description: Starsurge and Starfall have a <dynamic>8.0% - 19.2%</dynamic> chance to empower Eclipse or extend Moonfire and Sunfire by double the amount.

conduits.name: Born Anew
conduits.description: Rebirth grants the target 50% movement speed for 8 sec, and Well Fed, increasing their primary stat by <dynamic>20 - 48</dynamic> for 1 hour.

conduits.name: Deep Allegiance
conduits.description: Kindred Spirits's empowerment cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>10% - 24%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Endless Thirst
conduits.description: Ravenous Frenzy increases your critical chance by <dynamic>2.0% - 4.8%</dynamic> per stack.

conduits.name: Conflux of Elements
conduits.description: While channeling Convoke the Spirits, your damage and healing are increased by <dynamic>12.0% - 28.8%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Evolved Swarm
conduits.description: Adaptive Swarm increases periodic effects by an additional <dynamic>6.0% - 14.4%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Front of the Pack
conduits.description: Stampeding Roar's radius and duration are increased by <dynamic>15.0% - 36%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Born of the Wilds
conduits.description: The cooldown of Mighty Bash, Mass Entanglement, and Heart of the Wild are reduced by <dynamic>10% - 24%</dynamic>.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 20% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities for 4 min.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 20% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Kindred Spirits
covenants.description:
Form a bond with an ally. Every 1 min, you may empower the bond for 10 sec, granting you an effect based on your partner's role, and granting them an effect based on your role.

<spec>Guardian</spec>


<spec>Restoration</spec>


<spec>Balance</spec><spec>Feral</spec>

covenants.name: Convoke the Spirits
covenants.description:
Call upon the Night Fae for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 4 sec.

You will cast 

<spec>Balance (Level 16)</spec>
<dynamic>Starsurge, Starfall</dynamic>



<spec>Feral</spec><spec>Guardian</spec><spec>Restoration</spec>


 Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

covenants.name: Adaptive Swarm
covenants.description:
Command a swarm that heals (126% of Spell power) or deals (120% of Spell power) Shadow damage over 12 sec to a target, and increases the effectiveness of your periodic effects on them by 20%.

Upon expiration, jumps to a target within 25 yards, alternating between friend and foe up to 3 times.

covenants.name: Ravenous Frenzy
covenants.description:
For 20 sec, Druid spells you cast increase your damage, healing, and haste by 2%, stacking.

If you spend 1.5 sec idle, the Frenzy overcomes you, consuming 1% of your health per stack, stunning you for 1 sec, and ending.

legendaries.name: Oath of the Elder Druid
legendaries.description:
Effects of Thick Hide, Astral Influence, Feline Swiftness, and Ysera's Gift increased by 75%.

When you shift into your Affinity's form, you gain Heart of the Wild for 10 sec, once every 1 min.

legendaries.name: Circle of Life and Death
legendaries.description: Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.

legendaries.name: Draught of Deep Focus
legendaries.description: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 30%.

legendaries.name: Oneth's Clear Vision
legendaries.description: Starsurge and Starfall each have a 15% chance to make the other free.

legendaries.name: Primordial Arcanic Pulsar
legendaries.description: Every 300 Astral Power spent grants Celestial Alignment for 9 sec.

legendaries.name: Verdant Infusion
legendaries.description: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.

legendaries.name: The Dark Titan's Lesson
legendaries.description: You may Lifebloom two targets at once, and Lifebloom's final healing is increased by 75%.

legendaries.name: Vision of Unending Growth
legendaries.description: Rejuvenation healing has a 2% chance to create a new Rejuvenation on a nearby target.

legendaries.name: Ursoc's Fury Remembered
legendaries.description:
In Bear Form, Thrash has a 15% chance to trigger an additional Thrash.

Thrash grants you an absorb shield for 100% of all damage it deals.

legendaries.name: Luffa-Infused Embrace
legendaries.description: Thrash has 20% increased damage, 30% increased radius, and can stack 1 additional time.

legendaries.name: Legacy of the Sleeper
legendaries.description:
Berserk in Bear Form grants 25% increased damage, 15% Leech, and immunity to effects that cause loss of control of your character.

Its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.

legendaries.name: The Natural Order's Will
legendaries.description: Barkskin reduces damage by an additional 15%. When it begins or ends in Bear Form, you gain Ironfur and Frenzied Regeneration.

legendaries.name: Memory of the Mother Tree
legendaries.description: Wild Growth has a 25% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to 2 additional allies within 20 yards of the target.

legendaries.name: Apex Predator's Craving
legendaries.description: Rip damage has a 4% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite free and deal the maximum damage.

legendaries.name: Eye of Fearful Symmetry
legendaries.description: Tiger's Fury causes your next finishing move to restore 3 combo points.

legendaries.name: Cat-eye Curio
legendaries.description: Clearcast abilities generate 25% of their Energy cost, and your maximum energy is increased by 60.

legendaries.name: Balance of All Things
legendaries.description: Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 75%, decreasing by 15% every sec.

legendaries.name: Timeworn Dreambinder
legendaries.description: Starsurge and Starfall reduce the cost of Starsurge and Starfall by 15% for 6 sec, stacking up to 2 times.

legendaries.name: Frenzyband
legendaries.description:
Combo point-generating abilities reduce the cooldown of 

<condition>Incarnation: King of the Jungle</condition>
<dynamic>Incarnation: King of the Jungle by 0.2</dynamic>

Berserk by 0.2 sec.

During 

<condition>Incarnation: King of the Jungle</condition>
<dynamic>Incarnation: King of the Jungle</dynamic>

Berserk, they cause the target to bleed for an additonal 50% of their damage over 8 sec.

legendaries.name: Lycara's Fleeting Glimpse
legendaries.description:
Every 45 sec while in combat, cast a spell based on your form:

No Form: <dynamic>Wild Growth</dynamic>
Cat Form: <dynamic>Primal Wrath</dynamic>
Bear Form: <dynamic>Barkskin</dynamic>
Moonkin Form: <dynamic>Starfall</dynamic>
Travel Form: <dynamic>Stampeding Roar</dynamic>
